Description.Name: MASH Truck
Description.Details: Name: MASH Truck (Unarmed) Armor: Standard Technology: Inner Sphere Movement: 5/8 (Wheeled) Engine: 80 Fusion MASH Trucks (Mobile Army Surgical Hospital) are mobile medical units equipped with state-of-the-art medical equipment and surgical facilities. They are often deployed near the front lines, so that they can provide immediate care to injured soldiers. Many doctors feel that arming a MASH Truck violates their Hippocratic Oath, and have the weapons removed. These variants generally mount additional armor, or in this case, additional cargo space for infantry.
